sentences.english: We're always looking for influence, especially with music.
sentences.chinese: 我們總是在尋找具有影響力的人物，尤其是在樂壇。

sentences.english: Ms Stefanie Sun burst onto the Chinese music scene with her eponymous debut album in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿在2000年憑藉同名專輯進入華語樂壇。

sentences.english: With musical success achieved, Smith had a desire to try acting.
sentences.chinese: 在樂壇獲得成功之後，史密斯有意在影視界發展。

sentences.english: So far, it is still a rural American pop music, music coquettish independence.
sentences.chinese: 至今，它仍在美國流行樂壇上獨領鄉村音樂的風騷。

sentences.english: Wang Lee Hom is one of the best male artists in Chinese pop music.
sentences.chinese: 王力宏是華語流行樂壇最出色的男藝人之一。

sentences.english: HK music industry lost a super star .
sentences.chinese: 香港的樂壇又消失左一住焠燦的巨星。

sentences.english: The New Ocean Waves is one of the best bands on the music scene.
sentences.chinese: 新海浪樂隊是樂壇上最好的樂隊之一。

sentences.english: " The Puppet" is the only song which is accompanied by the orchestra nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 《木偶》是目前樂壇上唯一一首以絃樂伴秦的歌曲。

sentences.english: This 5-boy-group soon gained great success in the pop music world.
sentences.chinese: 這支由五個男孩組成的樂隊，在流行樂壇上很快走紅。

sentences.english: In Beijing's Yuetan park, a royal ceremony was held to worship the moon.
sentences.chinese: 北京的樂壇公園舉行盛大的典禮來拜月。

sentences.english: Her latest solo album has made her very famous in the world of pop music.
sentences.chinese: 她最近的獨唱專集使她在流行樂壇名聲大振。

sentences.english: E. appeared on the Mando-pop scene in 2001.
He is a different number of mainland music.
sentences.chinese: 他是內地樂壇的一個異數。

sentences.english: Luzaiyi is the one of the most famous composers in music field in China.
sentences.chinese: 陸在易是當今中國樂壇著名作曲家之一。
